Here at checkmirrors we strive to provide the very best service available, all of our instructors are fully ADI qualified instructors and are we now providing a fully COVID-19 secure learning environment.

We also have female instructors available and offer the NHS discount to qualifying NHS staff.

About checkmirrors

checkmirrors was established in 2014. The company director is Sarah Hellowell who has over 18 years experience instructing.

We are a small company with experienced driving instructors in York who give total quality tuition assuring complete safety for each pupil.

Our aim is not just to teach people to pass a driving test but to teach a skill for life so when they leave us they are a safe and competent driver.

Get in touch
